thread.title: Selena Gomez bringing Revival Tour to Palace
thread.title_full: Selena Gomez bringing Revival Tour to Palace

author: detroitnews.com
title: Selena Gomez bringing Revival Tour to Palace
text:
The ex-Disney star will perform at the Auburn Hills arena June 24; tickets go on sale Oct. 17 Selena Gomez. (Photo: Anthony Harvey / Getty Images) 
13 CONNECT 94 TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE Selena Gomez will bring her Revival Tour to the Palace of Auburn Hills June 24, tour promoters announced Monday.
Tickets for the concert go on sale Oct. 17; prices are TBA.
The tour comes in support of the 23-year-old ex-Disney star’s latest album, “Revival,” which is due out Friday. The album’s first single, “Good For You,” peaked at No. 5 on Billboard’s Hot 100 singles chart.
The 41-city Revival outing launches May 6 in Las Vegas and wraps July 8 in Los Angeles.
Gomez’ last area visit was a Nov. 2013 date at the Palace.
agraham@detroitnews.com 
@grahamorama
